reviewText: Great memories from a very trying and difficult year.  Kudos to the men on this team that stuck together!

Well, given all that was said about Penn State in the past year, it was nice to see how positive things were from this team.  Those that stayed, Coach O, will be thought highly of for years to come.  Great video, with lots of great extras.
It really capture what was deservingly one of the most "successful" seasons in NCAA football history. Penn State Football 2012 = perseverance. Enough said.
